channel.title: Them lifespans
channel.description:
In the welcoming thread i saw something curious: people enumerating some of the things that happened during the wait for BMS. Sounded like this:
(k3nny1550) [quote] - Gone through high school - Gotten a job, lost it due to the store closing - Gotten into two relationships in college so far (Surprised me too) - Bought a Playstation 3, a PSP with my own money, and bought a Wii for my mom - Gone from a FPS aficionado to an RPG junkie due to a greater appreciation of story - Attempted to make my own Source Mod (currently in a state of limbo) - Wrote, produced, directed, and starred in a TV style espionage drama currently in post production due to a similarly protracted schedule to Black Mesa - Said "fuck" approximately 12,000,000 times [/quote] Thought it would be nice to make a thread for this. Should be fun to observe how many things happened in all these months, considering we all come from different places/have different ages.
Especially, i'm curious to hear from the developers/moderators...they've been here the longest, and 4+ years is a significant amount of time.
starting: -got through highschool -lost two close friends to a carcrash. -got friendzoned more than i wanted -got laid less than i wanted (i plead the lonely island on this) -found love, or something similar enough to it -moved from one side of the world to the other semi-permanently. -went through several small jobs,earned MY first money. -observed this board -built a crossbow from scratch -designed a boardgame -played every significant title on the pc -never bought a console by principle/waiting patiently for current gen emulators to come up -produced my fair share of profanities and linguistic obscenity (including this post prehaps)
Off you go.

item.title: Them lifespans
item.dc:creator: Zuul
item.description:
CygNuS:

What a milestone

Buying 4 cars in 7 years? Damn…

cars are fucking pain in the ass…or I got screwed all four times. A Holden commodore would be nice though.

item.title: Them lifespans
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Adding to my old list.

  • Gone through high school
  • Gotten a job, lost it due to the store closing
  • Gotten into two relationships in college so far (Surprised me too)
  • Bought a Playstation 3, a PSP with my own money, and bought a Wii for my mom
  • Gone from a FPS aficionado to an RPG junkie due to a greater appreciation of story and a crappy internet connection making online gaming impossible
  • Attempted to make my own Source Mod (currently in a state of limbo)
  • Wrote, produced, directed, and starred in a TV style espionage drama currently in post production due to a similarly protracted schedule to Black Mesa
  • Said “fuck” approximately 12,000,000 times
  • Flipped a Ford Explorer, walked away with a few scratches and the occasional nightmare
  • Bought Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory for three separate platforms (Xbox, PC, PS2)

Read full topic

item.title: Them lifespans
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
-Turned 18(2011)
-Finished Highschool, haven’t get car license due to continuous failing the exam for 5 time.
-Get a job
-Stress got my depression worsen .
-Worked 3 month
-Bought my own desktop
-Masturbated totally over 300 time in two years.
-Got my first gas mask.
-Realized how long I was here since 2007 or 2008.

Read full topic

item.title: Them lifespans
item.dc:creator: CygNuS
item.description:
• joined the working community
  • bought a house
  • got married
  • toured the US west-coast
  • father-in-law passed away
  • became a father at 30 in 2012
  • got tempbanned here for the first time
  • checked the BM website for the 736813578th time
  • realized that I’m amongst the older on this forum, just like Drakey83

Read full topic

item.title: Them lifespans
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
-finished three years of high school
-got a four year degree
-entered the work force
-went from a band geek to a ballroom dancer
-released my own map
-bought, enjoyed, and exhausted a multimedia laptop over the course of six years
-built my first desktop gaming rig (1 yr old this month)
-about to start professional ballroom dance training

To think, I used to hope BM would be out before I finished high school.

Read full topic

item.title: Them lifespans
item.dc:creator: Fnork
item.description:
Well, shit, it’s been quite a few years and my memory sucks horribly, but I’ll try to remember some highlights. (This being only the time I’ve actually known about the mod (2007-))

-I’ve had approximately 14 600 mugs of tea.
-Watched approximately 4185 television episodes.
-Had somewhere between 182 and 365 bottles of Coke.
-Learnt how to use Macromedia Flash.
-Started uploading shitty web animation.
-Watched every episode of Doctor Who.
-Watched every episode of Star Trek.
-Moved three times.
-Been to four different schools.
-Gotten into legal trouble twice, both times getting away with no repercussions.
-Discovered my sexual identity.
-Finished primary school.
-Lost all of my friends early on.
-Didn’t get any new friends for five years.
-Performed twice at the theatre.
-Bought 20+ hats and a gasmask.
-Went through puberty.
-Got terribly ill and could barely move out of bed for a year.
-Was depressed five times.
-Started annoying people on this forum.
-Went on for way to long with this list.
-Did some stupid meta-shit.
-And lastly, this. … Oh god.

So, yeah, “highlights” is mostly just trivial things I’ve done since mid-2011 with a few earlier things thrown in.

Read full topic

item.title: Them lifespans
item.dc:creator: Dr.Awesomesauce
item.description:
Started 1st grade (2006)
Learned I am on the Autism Spectrum.
Learned how to use Hammer
Made a Counter-Strike map using a vehicle shaped like bacon
Joined BZPower
Hacked my dad’s Facebook account in 4th grade
Signed up for band class
Nearly drowned at a waterpark
Quit Band class
Heard aboot Black Mesa
At age 13, I managed to wreck a truck. On top of a vertically standing pole
Joined Wrong Planet.
Got a 1920x1080 monitor
Ate a cookie

Read full topic

item.description:
-started 1st grade (2005)
-made lots of friends, lost lots
-Aunt died
-started 5th grade (2009)
-started to get interested in computers and such
-discovered Black Mesa (watched forum for 2 years before actually making an account)
-started 6th grade
-bought first graphics card
-finally made an account
-started 7th grade
-computer died, bought new (current) one
-summer is kinda boring

item.title: Them lifespans

item.description:
-Bought my first laptop, Dell Inspiron 6000
-Bought PS3 (40gb, now 230gb) + GTA IV
-First flight
-Played GTA IV through 5-8 times.
-Finished Primary school
-Learned to map for Source.
-Learned how not to suck in most online games.
-Got my heart ripped out too many times.
-Played GTA IV:TBOGT through 4 times.
-Bought my second laptop, Acer Aspire 7741G
-Played Civilization IV straight for 22 hours. (Fun times.)
-Learned some basic HTML
-Found out that i like red wine.
-Finished Middle school
-Starting High school

item.title: Them lifespans
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
Ramirezoid:
  • It’s been 4 years and I still haven’t been able to find a first job.
  • Lost 80 pounds. someone pointed it out and I developed narcissistic paranoia
  • Booted out of high school, graduated night school via graphic design class. Now I hate art.
  • Got myself nearly murdered by making an illegal left turn. Lost my car.
  • Still fighting the fact that I’m likely not very heterosexually inclined
  • Got a new car, lost all my free time and happiness to 12 hour days of repairing it

not an eventful passage of time. I’m pretty disgusted with myself as a human being anyway

I would trade it with ya anytime

Read full topic
